title: DGFT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Young Professional Posts
description: The Directorate General of Foreign Trade (DGFT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Young Professional Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, LLB, and Post-graduation can apply for the DGFT Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age...
